Package project.controller

Class UpdateCustomerController

java.lang.Object
project.controller.UpdateCustomerController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class UpdateCustomerController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller for the UpdateCustomer view. Handles user interactions within the view, such as button clicks and ComboBox selections. Responsible for populating form fields with the data of the customer to be updated, validating user input, updating the customer's data in the database, and navigating back to the main view.
Author:
Teksong Eap

  • Method Details

    • updateCustomer

      public void updateCustomer(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Handles the action of the update button being clicked. Validates the form input and, if valid, updates the customer's data in the database and navigates back to the main view.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the ActionEvent object
      Throws:
      IOException - if there is an error loading the main view

    • setCustomerToUpdate

      public void setCustomerToUpdate(Customer customer)
      Sets the customer to be updated and populates the form fields with the customer's data. Mostly the same as the one in AddCustomer.
      Parameters:
      customer - the customer to be updated

    • updateDivisionComboBox

      public void updateDivisionComboBox(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws SQLException
      Handles the action of the country ComboBox's selected item changing. Updates the items in the division ComboBox based on the selected country.
      Parameters:
      event - the ActionEvent object representing the ComboBox selection change event
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is a database access error

    • cancel

      public void cancel(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Handles the action of the cancel button being clicked. Displays a confirmation dialog, and if the user confirms, navigates back to the main view.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the ActionEvent object
      Throws:
      IOException - if there is an error loading the main view

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initializes the controller and requests focus on the customerName TextField and populates the country ComboBox with all countries.

      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
